# Wind shelter
```{r}
# Settings used by Plattner et al. (2004):
ctrl = wind.shelter.prep(6,-pi/4,pi/12,10)
focal.function("dem.asc",fun=wind.shelter,control=ctrl,
radius=6,search.mode="circle")
```
